name: build
description: Simple script library to easily execute. Run 'yarn make' to build Docker file. 'yarn it' to run the docker image and spawn shell terminal.

scripts.publish: docker build . -t lazarus-base && docker tag lazarus-base yourname/lazarus-docker:1.0.4-d116slim && docker push yourname/lazarus-docker:1.0.4-d116slim
scripts.publish:104: docker build . -t lazarus-base && docker tag lazarus-base yourname/lazarus-docker:1.0.4-d116slim && docker push yourname/lazarus-docker:1.0.4-d116slim

author: Christian Wimmer
